name: A Tale of Cat and Mouse
name_original: A Tale of Cat and Mouse
description:
An evil sorceress's magic created a monster cat. Can a plucky young mouse save his sister and defeat this giant enemy?

Arrows/WASD - Move

Z/Space - Attack

Xenika: Game Design, Art, Story Design

snuffysam: Programming, Game Design

Rin: Art

Tetsu: Music, Sound Design, Game Design
